name: W. Edward WOOD, Director of the Department of Environmental Management v. B. Albert FORD et al.

judges: BEVILACQUA, C. J., and DORIS, J., did not participate.
parties: W. Edward WOOD, Director of the Department of Environmental Management v. B. Albert FORD et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petitioner’s motion for stay of the Superior Court judgment pending a decision on the petition for certiorari is granted.
BEVILACQUA, C. J., and DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Sean 0. Coffey, Chief Legal Counsel, Department of Environmental Management, Providence, for petitioner.
John S. Foley, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., Frank Caprio, Providence, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
W. Edward WOOD, Director of the Department of Environmental Management v. B. Albert FORD et al.
No. 80-424-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Sept. 25, 1980.
Sean 0. Coffey, Chief Legal Counsel, Department of Environmental Management, Providence, for petitioner.
John S. Foley, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., Frank Caprio, Providence, for respondents.
